subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mario Boggan scored from the right block with 11.5 seconds left to give Oklahoma State a 57-56 victory against No. 7 Texas A&M last night in the Big 12 tournament quarterfinals in Oklahoma City.
snippet: Mario Boggan scored from the right block with 11.5 seconds left to give Oklahoma State a 57-56 victory against No. 7 Texas A&M last night in the Big 12 tournament quarterfinals in Oklahoma City.
